meta.name: Mibu Minimal Budgeting - Design System
meta.description: High-level design system and tokens to reproduce a minimal monochrome iOS-style budgeting UI. Use as instructions for AI-driven replication and component implementation.

visual: Minimal — reduce visual noise to highlight content (numbers, labels, micro-interactions).
Monochrome clarity — black, white, and soft greys; rely on scale, weight and space to create hierarchy.
Friendly line-art — human illustration style on splash screens to add warmth without color.
Large numeric emphasis — balances and primary values are bold and oversized to be quickly scanned.
Generous touch targets — mobile-first; keep interactive elements >= 44px.
interaction: Subtle motion — smooth, short transitions for graphs and pill selection; avoid heavy micro-animations.
Context first — show the primary data (balance) at top, contextual controls in small, light UI.
Affordance through shape — use rounded pills and circles to indicate tappable items.
Accessible contrast — ensure black-on-white values meet AA; use darker greys for secondary text.

typography.fontFamily: -apple-system, 'SF Pro Text', 'Inter', system-ui, Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif

AppShell.notes: Full-screen mobile shell. Keep large white margins and a centered vertical rhythm.

SplashOnboarding.description: Minimal onboarding / splash with line-art portrait and category pills
SplashOnboarding.illustrationStyle: single-stroke hand-drawn portrait; export as SVG; stroke ~2px; fill none; keep margin around illustration.

right.amountColor: foreground for income, muted/dark red for expense

DateCarousel.description: Horizontal date scroller with selected day as black rounded square/circle

Icons.style: outline, single weight (2px), simplified shapes. Provide monochrome SVGs with 2px stroke. Avoid filled icons except for center call-to-action which can be solid.

patterns.spacingRhythm: Use base spacing of 8px. Major sections spaced by multiples of 16px. Top/bottom safe margins 16-20px.
patterns.hierarchy: Large numeric (balance) > chart preview > recent transactions. Use font weight and size for immediate hierarchy rather than color.
patterns.pillsAndChips: Use pill shapes for filters and small selections. Selected pill becomes solid black with white text; default is transparent with subtle 1px stroke.
patterns.forms: Inputs are large, centered, and visually minimal. Numeric keypads are circular, high-contrast digits, ample spacing to avoid mis-taps.

accessibility.textContrast: Foreground text should meet at least AA contrast vs white. Secondary text can be #8A8A8F or darker.
accessibility.motion: Allow user to reduce motion. Keep animations under 200ms.
accessibility.labels: All icons must have accessible labels and hit-area semantics for screen readers.

illustration.style: single-line portrait SVG, no fills, 2px stroke
illustration.sizeGuideline: SVG viewBox 600x600, scale to fit 45% of vertical viewport on splash

assets.emojiFallback: Use system emoji for avatars; provide circular background surface at 32px if no image.
assets.icons: SVG outline set provided at 24px canvas with 2px stroke and 2px padding. Provide 1x and 2x export for mobile.

implementationNotes.responsive: Keep scale proportional: use clamp() or small/large size tokens for compact vs regular phones.
implementationNotes.svg: Graphs should be SVG paths with stroke-linecap round and stroke-linejoin round. Interaction points are filled circles sized 8–12px.
implementationNotes.testing: Test tap targets on small phones; check vertical overflow when keyboard is present for amount entry.
